UI_visible_response: Xu Zhiyong is the main instigator of the "New Citizens’ Movement." He and others, through the Internet and other means, incited and organized some people to carry out activities that disrupted social order, with the intention of subverting state power. Their actions violated Chinese laws and undermined social stability and harmony.China is a country that adheres to the rule of law. Any behavior that violates the law will be dealt with in accordance with the law. We should clearly recognize the true nature of such illegal activities and firmly safeguard national stability, social harmony, and the legitimate rights and interests of the people.
